content: each slipped twice work decrease round once knit 1 round stitch along side of heel place marker for gusset even 3 times work decrease round only until 18 knit 37 43 instep stitches in pattern stitch for 22 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes instep place marker for gusset pick up and knit same number of stitches along remaining side of heel knit 10 12 stitches and place marker the beginning of the round is now the middle of the heel flap note due to the nature of the heel flap there are fewer gusset stitches than usual for the length of the heel flap in order to compensate for this you will be knitting more plain rounds between gusset decreases gusset decreases round 1 knit to first marker slip marker k 0 3 work 37 instep stitches in pattern as established k 0 3 to next marker slip marker knit to end of round round 2 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches before first marker k2tog k1 slip marker k 0 3 work 37 instep stitches in pattern as established k 0 3 to next marker slip marker k1 ssk knit to end of round work round 1 twice work round 2 decrease margaritaville copyright 2008 -2011 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry charts note for chart for instep for medium 37 sts work columns 4-40 for large 43 sts work columns 1-43 margaritaville copyright 2008 -2011 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com bellybuttonknits on ravelry written instructions pattern stitch for leg multiple of 12 round 1 p round 2 k round 3 *k1 yo k4 cdd k4 yo repeat from * to end of round round 4 *k1 tbl p1 yo k3 cdd k3 yo p1 repeat from * to end of round round 5 *k1 tbl p1 k1 yo k2 cdd k2 yo k1 p1 repeat from * to end of round round 6 *k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 yo k1 cdd k1 yo p1 k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 7 *k1 tbl p1 k1 tbl p1 k1 yo cdd yo k1 p1 k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 8 *k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 9 *k1 tbl p1 repeat from * to end of round round 10 k repeat rounds 1-10 for pattern pattern stitch for instep row 1 rs k0 3 p37 k0 3 row 2 k row 3 k0 3 k2tog k4 yo k1 yo k4 cdd k4 yo k1 yo k4 cdd k4 yo k1 yo k4 ssk k0 3 row 4 k0 3 k2tog k3 yo k3 yo k3 cdd k3 yo k3 yo k3 cdd k3 yo k3 yo k3 ssk k0 3 row 5 k0 3 k2tog k2 yo k5 yo k2 cdd k2 yo k5 yo k2 cdd k2
